analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/20/0x439ce375e3ee4dc203d71958beca3c0f417d65cb.sol:
	Contract BoiToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/20/0x439ce375e3ee4dc203d71958beca3c0f417d65cb.sol#218)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/20/0x439ce375e3ee4dc203d71958beca3c0f417d65cb.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
